tasks.task: Irrigation and Water Management in Agriculture
subtasks: Considering the essential role of water in plant survival
Understanding the significance of proper irrigation for crop growth
Identifying factors determining the right time and amount of water for irrigation
Recognizing the various sources of irrigation water (groundwater, surface water, non-conventional sources)
Exploring traditional irrigation methods (pulley systems, rotating chain pumps, liver systems, furrow irrigation)
Evaluating modern irrigation techniques (sprinkler system, drip irrigation)
Understanding the transition from traditional to modern irrigation methods and their efficiency
